FuncDef: This command re-initializes the card in the specified slot. A clear card command (without the soft) is referred to as aHard Reset. A clear card x soft command (with the soft) is referred to as aSoft Reset.

ParaDef.Info: Clears information for the specified card slot. Values-1 to 20, A, B, C, D.
Displays information for the specified forwarding plane. Values-1 to 6.
Clears the high water marks within the HS pool on the specified card and FP.
Clears the high water marks within the mid pools in the HS pool and on the specified card and FP. Values-1 to 16.
Clears the high water marks within the root pools in the HS pool and on the specified card and FP. Values-1 to 16.
Clears the high water marks within the in the HS system pool and on the specified card and FP.
